ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag

Class UltrasonicNavigationData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.UltrasonicNavigationData

  • public class UltrasonicNavigationData
extends java.lang.Object
    The UltrasonicNavigationData class processes the data coming from an ultrasonic sensor while the robot is navigating in oder to avoid obstacles
    Author:
    Michael Vaquier

        Parameters:
        rightMotor - Reference to right motor
        leftMotor - Reference to left motor
        tile - Length of the side of a tile
        boardSize - Size of the board (how many tiles on one side)

    • Method Detail

      • processData

        public void processData(int distance)
        Processes data coming from the ultrasonic poller and performs different processing depending on the current navigation state of the controller. In NAVIGATING state, the distance to the closest object in front of the robot is found to avoid potential collisions. In AVOIDING state, the data processor takes control of the wheels and follows the wall with the assumption that the ultrasonic sensor is facing the side.
        Parameters:
        distance - New distance fetched from the Ultrasonic sensor

      • setOdometer

        public void setOdometer(Odometer odometer)
        Sets the Odometer association of the instance.
        Parameters:
        odometer - Association to the odometer instance

      • setNavigation

        public void setNavigation(Navigation navigation)
        Sets the Navigation association of the instance.
        Parameters:

      • setNavigationController

        public void setNavigationController(NavigationController navigationController)
        Sets the NavigationController association of the instance.
        Parameters:
        navigationController - Association to the NavigationController instance
